mapper.select: select id as memberCode, name as memberName, email, password, phone_number as phone, created_at as regDate, point, member_level as memberLevel, image_name as memberImgName, image_path as memberImgPath, image_size as memberImgSize, info as memberInfo from member where id = #{hostCode}
mapper.insert: insert into RESERVATION(reserveCode, memberCode, houseCode, reserveDate, checkIn, checkOut, state, payment, people) values (seq_reserveCode_num.nextval, #{memberCode}, #{houseCode}, #{reserveDate}, #{checkIn}, #{checkOut}, #{state}, #{payment}, #{people})
insert into REMAIN(resDate, people, houseCode) values (#{resDate}, #{people}, #{houseCode})
mapper.select: select resDate, sum(people) as people from remain where houseCode = #{houseCode} group by resDate

select id as memberCode, name as memberName, email, password, phone_number as phone, created_at as regDate, point, member_level as memberLevel, image_name as memberImgName, image_path as memberImgPath, image_size as memberImgSize, info as memberInfo from member where email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into message(msgCode, memberCode, msgContent, msgDate, msgCheck) values (seq_msgCode_num.nextval, #{memberCode}, #{msgContent}, #{msgDate}, #{msgCheck})
mapper.select: select count(*) from REVIEW inner join RESERVATION on REVIEW.RESERVECODE = RESERVATION.RESERVECODE and RESERVATION.HOUSECODE = #{houseCode}

SELECT * FROM (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select REVIEW.*, HOUSE.HOUSECODE, member.email from REVIEW inner join RESERVATION on REVIEW.RESERVECODE = RESERVATION.RESERVECODE inner join HOUSE on RESERVATION.HOUSECODE = HOUSE.HOUSECODE and RESERVATION.HOUSECODE = #{houseCode} inner join member on REVIEW.memberCode = member.id ORDER BY REVIEW.revDate Desc) A) b WHERE b.rnum >= #{startRow} and b.rnum <= #{endRow}
